item.title: Developing in the WSL with VSCode
item.description: The Windows Subsystem for Linux lets developers run a Linux environment on a Windows OS, which is considerably lighter than VMs. The following is the first post of a series that will detail the deployment of python applications in a Linux container on Azure. Installation of WSL can be carried out by following the steps listed here. It is necessary to enable two features to use the WSL environment: VM Platform Windows subsystem for Linux.
